Key.Original: Set VBIEDs vectorDir values. Do not change values, if Position of VBIED (predefined position) is selected.
Key.English: Set VBIEDs vectorDir values. Do not change values, if Position of VBIED (predefined position) is selected.

Key.Original: Set VBIEDs attachTo values. Do not change values, if Position of VBIED (predefined position) is selected.
Key.English: Set VBIEDs attachTo values. Do not change values, if Position of VBIED (predefined position) is selected.

Key.Original: Set VBIEDs vectorUp values. Do not change values, if Position of VBIED (predefined position) is selected.
Key.English: Set VBIEDs vectorUp values. Do not change values, if Position of VBIED (predefined position) is selected.

Key.Original: Distance to player when VBIED will be activated. If the value is under 1m, random distance value from addon options will be used.
Key.English: Distance to player when VBIED will be activated. If the value is under 1m, random distance value from addon options will be used.

Key.Original: Set probability of VBIED being dud.
Key.English: Set probability of VBIED being dud.

Key.Original: VBIED will be activated when vehicle engine is started.
Key.English: VBIED will be activated when vehicle engine is started.

Key.Original: VBIED will be activated when someone gets in vehicle.
Key.English: VBIED will be activated when someone gets in vehicle.

Key.Original: VBIED will be activated when this vehicle is moving (define speed below).
Key.English: VBIED will be activated when this vehicle is moving (define speed below).

Key.Original: If you want to make your own position for VBIED, choose this.
Key.English: If you want to make your own position for VBIED, choose this.

Key.Original: Save failed. Maximum amount of positions reached.
Key.English: Save failed. Maximum amount of positions reached.

Key.Original: A maximum of five custom positions can be saved per vehicle model (.p3d). Named and saved positions will be added to the Position of VBIED list. If a sixth position is attempted to save, nothing will happen. Saved custom positions are stored in the 'iedd_vbied_userDefined' profileNameSpace, so the game can be restarted without affecting the saved positions.
Key.English: A maximum of five custom positions can be saved per vehicle model (.p3d). Named and saved positions will be added to the Position of VBIED list. If a sixth position is attempted to save, nothing will happen. Saved custom positions are stored in the 'iedd_vbied_userDefined' profileNameSpace, so the game can be restarted without affecting the saved positions.

Key.Original: VBIED will be activated if speed of this vehicle gets over selected value.
Key.English: VBIED will be activated if speed of this vehicle gets over selected value.

Key.Original: Set probability of VBIEDs being duds (if not defined somewhere else).
Key.English: Set probability of VBIEDs being duds (if not defined somewhere else).

Key.Original: VBIEDs will be activated when vehicle engine is started.
Key.English: VBIEDs will be activated when vehicle engine is started.

Key.Original: VBIED will be activated when someone gets in.
Key.English: VBIED will be activated when someone gets in.

Key.Original: VBIEDs will be activated when vehicle is moving.
Key.English: VBIEDs will be activated when vehicle is moving.

Key.Original: Set explosion size for VBIEDs (if not defined somewhere else).
Key.English: Set explosion size for VBIEDs (if not defined somewhere else).

Key.Original: VBIED will be activated if speed of this vehicle gets over selected value (if not defined somewhere else).
Key.English: VBIED will be activated if speed of this vehicle gets over selected value (if not defined somewhere else).

Key.Original: Add countdown timer to VBIEDs (if not defined somewhere else).
Key.English: Add countdown timer to VBIEDs (if not defined somewhere else).

Key.Original: Set VBIED variations (if not defined somewhere else).
Key.English: Set VBIED variations (if not defined somewhere else).

Key.Original: VBIEDs are detectable with mine detectors
Key.English: VBIEDs are detectable with mine detectors

Key.Original: Controls if VBIEDs are detectable with mine detectors.
Key.English: Controls if VBIEDs are detectable with mine detectors.

Key.Original: Maximum distance to VBIED where player will activate it.
Key.English: Maximum distance to VBIED where player will activate it.

Key.Original: Minimum distance to VBIED where player will activate it.
Key.English: Minimum distance to VBIED where player will activate it.

Key.Original: Controls if VBIEDs can be activated by players on foot.
Key.English: Controls if VBIEDs can be activated by players on foot.

Key.Original: Controls if VBIEDs can be activated by players in vehicle.
Key.English: Controls if VBIEDs can be activated by players in vehicle.
